typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_EmploymentHistory")
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSql

scriptLines: sourceJson derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_OrgPayRuns")
}
source(output(
		{Org.LegalName} as string,
		{Org.OrganizationId} as string,
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		currentFinancialYearEndDate as string,
		currentFinancialYearStartDate as string,
		payCalendars as (atoLodgementsEnabled as boolean, description as string, payCalendarId as string, period as string, periodStartDate as string, proRataMode as string, weeklyFactor as double, weeklyFactorEquation as short)[],
		payRuns as (backPayDateOverride as string, dateLastCalculated as string, dateOpened as string, datePublished as string, employeeCount as short, eofyLodgementStatus as string, financialYearEndDate as string, financialYearStartDate as string, initiatingUserId as string, initiatingUserName as string, lodgementStatus as string, notes as string, payCalendarId as string, payCalendarName as string, payRunId as string, paymentDate as string, payslipGenerationStatus as string, periodEnd as string, periodStart as string, publishingUserId as string, publishingUserName as string, runNumber as short, status as string, superannuationPaymentDate as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson foldDown(unroll(payRuns),
	mapColumn(
		backPayDateOverride = payRuns.backPayDateOverride,
		dateLastCalculated = payRuns.dateLastCalculated,
		dateOpened = payRuns.dateOpened,
		datePublished = payRuns.datePublished,
		employeeCount = payRuns.employeeCount,
		eofyLodgementStatus = payRuns.eofyLodgementStatus,
		financialYearEndDate = payRuns.financialYearEndDate,
		financialYearStartDate = payRuns.financialYearStartDate,
		initiatingUserId = payRuns.initiatingUserId,
		initiatingUserName = payRuns.initiatingUserName,
		lodgementStatus = payRuns.lodgementStatus,
		notes = payRuns.notes,
		payCalendarId = payRuns.payCalendarId,
		payCalendarName = payRuns.payCalendarName,
		payRunId = payRuns.payRunId,
		paymentDate = payRuns.paymentDate,
		payslipGenerationStatus = payRuns.payslipGenerationStatus,
		periodEnd = payRuns.periodEnd,
		periodStart = payRuns.periodStart,
		publishingUserId = payRuns.publishingUserId,
		publishingUserName = payRuns.publishingUserName,
		runNumber = payRuns.runNumber,
		status = payRuns.status,
		superannuationPaymentDate = payRuns.superannuationPaymentDate,
		type = payRuns.type,
		{Org.LegalName},
		{Org.OrganizationId},
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		currentFinancialYearEndDate,
		currentFinancialYearStartDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenPayRuns
flattenPayRuns derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

	outputRejectedData: true,

	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),

sourceJson derive(PipelineTriggerTime = toTimestamp(PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'Australia/NSW')) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',

scriptLines: headers as (createDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, customFieldsKeyName as string, dataType as string, defaultPivotAggregation as string, defaultPivotColumnOrder as boolean, defaultPivotRowOrder as short, defaultPivotValueOrder as boolean, defaultSortDirection as string, defaultSortOrder as boolean, disableDefaultAggregation as boolean, falseText as string, fieldName as string, filterDisabled as boolean, hiddenByDefault as boolean, isCustomFields as boolean, isDynamicColumns as boolean, nullDisplayText as string, numericPrecision as string, prependBaseColumnNameToDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, searchDisabled as boolean, sortDisabled as boolean, title as string, trueText as string)[],

reportData as (approvers as string, dateSubmitted as string, employeeId as string, employeeNumber as integer, firstName as string, gender as string, leaveAppNumDays as short, leaveApplicationId as string, leaveDateEnd as date, leaveDateStart as date, leaveNotes as string, leavePaymentStatus as string, leaveReasonName as string, leaveTypeId as string, leaveTypeName as string, leaveUnitOfMeasure as string, leaveUnits as double, printName as string, status as string, surname as string)[],

flattenReportData derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns

headers as (createDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, customFieldsKeyName as string, dataType as string, defaultPivotAggregation as string, defaultPivotColumnOrder as boolean, defaultPivotRowOrder as short, defaultPivotValueOrder as boolean, defaultSortDirection as string, defaultSortOrder as boolean, disableDefaultAggregation as boolean, falseText as string, fieldName as string, filterDisabled as boolean, hiddenByDefault as boolean, isCustomFields as boolean, isDynamicColumns as boolean, nullDisplayText as string, numericPrecision as string, prependBaseColumnNameToDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, searchDisabled as boolean, sortDisabled as boolean, title as string, trueText as string)[],

reportData as (employeeId as string, employeeNumber as integer, firstName as string, leaveEntitlementHours as double, leaveProRataHours as double, leaveTotalHours as double, leaveTypeId as string, leaveTypeName as string, primaryDepartmentCode as short, primaryDepartmentGlCode as string, primaryDepartmentName as string, primaryLocationCode as string, primaryLocationGlCode as string, primaryLocationName as string, primaryProjectCode as string, primaryProjectGlCode as string, primaryProjectName as string, primaryRoleCode as string, primaryRoleName as string, printName as string, surname as string)[],

flattenReportData derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns

transformations.name: castDateColumns
transformations.description: Creating/updating the columns G'PipelineName, PipelineRunId, PipelineTriggerTime, QueryFinishDate, QueryStartDate, amount, createdByUser, createdDate, date1, employeeId, employmentType, end, firstName, lastName, modifiedByUser, modifiedDate, quantity, room, rosterEntryId, rosterId, serviceCode, start, SourceFileName'

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_Rosters")
}
source(output(
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		QueryFinishDate as date,
		QueryStartDate as date,
		amount as double,
		createdByUser as string,
		createdDate as string,
		date as string,
		employeeId as string,
		employmentType as string,
		end as string,
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		modifiedByUser as string,
		modifiedDate as string,
		quantity as double,
		room as string,
		rosterEntryId as string,
		rosterId as string,
		serviceCode as string,
		start as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(end = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', end, ':00')),
		start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', start, ':00')),
		date = toDate(date),
		PipelineTriggerTime = toTimestamp(PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'Australia/NSW'),
		createdDate = toDate(createdDate),
		modifiedDate = toDate(modifiedDate)) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

		end = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', end, ':00')),
		start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', start, ':00'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

source(output(

castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

sourceRelativeUrl.value:
@concat(
'/api/company/', 
item().organizationId,
'/reporting/leave-applications',
'?fromDate=',
formatDateTime(addDays(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), -28), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
'&toDate=',
formatDateTime(addDays(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 105), 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT organizationId
FROM dbo.Definitiv_Organizations
WHERE tradingName IN ('Nest Employee Services Pty Ltd')
